main event: A witness observed a bright, round object hovering in the sky for about 30 seconds before disappearing from sight in Sharpsville, Pennsylvania on April 11, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 17 feet in size and emitting no sound or light.
The witness could not see the object move, but reported it was hovering before disappearing.
Multiple witnesses reported the sighting to the Air Force's Project Blue Book investigation.
The Air Force requested the witness complete a detailed questionnaire about the observation.
No photographs of the object were included in the report.
